title: Profile Predictor
description: This intuitive app invites users to input a name and, upon submission, employs three specialized APIs to predict the age, gender, and nationality associated with that name. It's a quick and engaging way to discover the demographic and cultural implications of names from around the globe.

title: Recipe Landing Page
description: I developed a pixel-perfect landing page that precisely matched the customer's aesthetic and functional specifications, ensuring every detail, such as typography, seamlessly aligned with their vision.

title: Analyzing Police Statistics
description: The project includes multiple scripts designed to analyze large datasets, specifically focusing on data related to arrests. These scripts evaluate factors such as the type of violation committed and the age of the individuals involved. The goal is to help users identify patterns in the data, such as whether certain violations are more common among specific age groups.

title: Password Manager
description: A robust password manager that leverages advanced encryption techniques to ensure enhanced security for storing and managing passwords. Developed using Python and incorporating Fender's encryption technology, this tool provides a highly secure solution for protecting sensitive information from unauthorized access.

title: Asteroids Game
description: Used JavaScript and advanced animation techniques to modernize the classic "Asteroids" game. By leveraging HTML5 canvas and the requestAnimationFrame API, I enhanced the game's graphics and animations for smooth, responsive gameplay. The game features intuitive controls, and sophisticated collision detection, offering a fresh experience that appeals to both nostalgic players and new audiences.

title: Sortable (To-Do List App)
description: This to-do list app is designed to be highly accessible, incorporating intuitive gestures and engaging animations to significantly enrich the user experience. This approach not only simplifies task management but also makes the process more interactive and enjoyable for users of all skill levels.

title: Portfolio Web Page
description: A website to showcase all my projects in one place, designed for easy navigation and an engaging user experience. The site features smooth animations using Tailwind CSS and employs dynamic routing to enhance code efficiency and maintainability.

title: QuoteSnap Front-End
description: QuoteSnap is an Android app that enables users to capture photos of inspirational text. Utilizing OCR technology, the app recognizes and extracts the text from the images.

title: QuoteSnap Back-End
description: A fully functional database using MongoDB, which includes user login profiles, personalised categories for each user, and the ability to save quotes for each user.

title: NC News Front-End
description: This project helps users view articles that are stored in an API. Users can also add and delete comments as well as upvote/like their favourite articles

title: NC News Back-End
description: A full functional database using PSQL. You can make multiple requests such as get data by article ID,upvote and add or delete a comment
